LZ77

Class LZ77Decompression

  • java.lang.Object
    • LZ77.LZ77Decompression

  • public class LZ77Decompression
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that decompresses the file with LZ77 algorithm.

                throws java.io.IOException

      • writeMatch

        public java.lang.String writeMatch(java.lang.String s,
                                   int distance,
                                   int length,
                                   java.io.FileOutputStream fos)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Finds the match and writes it into output.
        Parameters:
        s - String, string that contains all characters that have been decompressed from input.
        distance - Integer, the distance of a match from current position.
        length - Integer, the length of the match.
        fos - FileOutputStream, used for writing output file.
        Returns:
        S String, the updated string.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
